createVaultBottomSheet.title: New vault
createVaultBottomSheet.subTitle: Create individual or community vaults
createVaultBottomSheet.individualDescription: Create a personal Vault for your own assets and transactions. You retain full control and ownership.
createVaultBottomSheet.communityDescription: Establish a shared Vault for collaborative management. Multiple members can jointly control & transact within this safe.

createVault.selectChain: select the chain on which to create your vault
createVault.safeEnvironmentDescription: Make sure you are alone & no camera is recording you or the screen.
createVault.sensitiveInformationDescription: Whomever can access your recovery phrase, can steal your funds.
createVault.safelyStoredDescription: If you forget it or lose it, your funds are going to be lost as well.
createVault.recoveryPhraseDescription: This set of 12 words will allow you to recover your vault in case of loss or damage.
createVault.securityRemind: Make sure to be in a private & safe space
createVault.createVaultSuccess: Your new $vaultType vault ‘$name’ has been created

createPIN.setPINDescription: You’ll need your PIN to log in to your wallet. This PIN secures the wallet on this device.

emptyVault: You don't have any vaults yet. Create one now to manage your assets in a collective & secure way!
